data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud - 1.0.3
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Get URL Rating
workflows.description: Get rating details for the URL you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get URL Rating

workflows.name: Update White or Black List
workflows.description: Updates an existing whitelist or blacklist in Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud, based on the input parameter that  you have specified.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Update White or Black List

routes.name: Alerts -> Update White or Black List

workflows.name: Get AV-Rescan Result
workflows.description: Retrieves AV-Rescan results for the time duration you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get AV-Rescan Result

workflows.name: Get Submission Job List
workflows.description: Retrieves all job IDs associated with submission ID you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get Submission Job List

workflows.name: Get Job Verdict Detail
workflows.description: Retrieves job verdict detail for job ID you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get Job Verdict Detail

workflows.name: Get All Installed VM
workflows.description: Retrieves the names and the clone numbers of all installed VMs on Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get All Installed VM

workflows.name: Get File Verdict
workflows.description: Retrieves the file verdict details for the file type and filehash you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get File Verdict

workflows.name: Get PDF Report
workflows.description: Retrieves a PDF report from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud based on the query type and value parameter you have specified and creates an attachment in the CyOPs™ 'Attachment' module if the report is found.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get PDF Report

workflows.name: Submit File
workflows.description: Submit file to FortiSandbox from CyOPs attachment.

workflows.name: Submit URL
workflows.description: Submit URL to Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

workflows.name: Get Job Behaviour
workflows.description: Retrieves job behaviour details associated with the file type and filehash you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get Job Behaviour

workflows.name: List Filehash or URL From Malware Package or URL Package
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of file hashes or URLs based on the type you have specified from the Malware Package or URL Package in Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

steps.name: List Filehash or URL From Malware Package or URL Package

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud
arguments.operationTitle: List Filehash or URL From Malware Package or URL Package

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: List Filehash or URL From Malware Package or URL Package

routes.name: Alerts -> List Filehash or URL From Malware Package or URL Package

workflows.name: Get Scan Stats
workflows.description: Retrieves the scan stats for the last 7 days from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get Scan Stats

workflows.name: Get File Rating
workflows.description: Retrieves file rating for the file type and filehash you have specified from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get File Rating

workflows.name: Toggle FPN State
workflows.description: Marks specified sample based on the Job ID you have specified as false negative or false positive in Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Toggle FPN State

arguments.name: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud
arguments.operationTitle: Mark Sample False Negative or False Positive

routes.name: Alerts -> Mark Sample False Negative or False Positive

workflows.name: Get System Status
workflows.description: Retrieves the status of the system from Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud.

arguments.title: Fortinet FortiSandbox Cloud: Get System Status
